case.title: Searching for my boo <3 - 22 (bronx)
case.text: Hey guys I'm 22. Looking for a boo( a guy that can keep a good convo, is employed, and loves to have fun). Honestly I have a bf however if I find that right person I will definitely tell him goodbye!!. I want a guy that I will have a good connection with and if I do then maybe that someone may get some benefits as well lol and if it leads to more than that's great!! I like to go to movies, dinner, strip clubs etc. Money and success is my motivation, so yes I work and I don't depend on no man. However it would be nice if that someone has the same drive as I do. I'm medium brown skin, thick in all the right places not fat at all!! I don't really have a type but don't be sloppy either. However I have a age limit 29 is the oldest I will date!!. IF YOUR LOOKING FOR JUST A QUICK FUCK DONT HIT ME UP CAUSE IM NOT THE ONE!! So if your interested contact me with a picture and we can see where this goes..<3
